definition: arteries and veins/vein (on a leaf, insect wing etc)

sentences.english: To investigate clinical feature and therapeutic approach of traumatic dural sinus.
sentences.chinese: 探讨外伤性颅内静脉窦损伤的临床特点及治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the treatment of cooperative care of patients with IVP.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨静脉肾盂造影的护理配合。

sentences.english: Few data on air pollution exposure and risk of venous thrombosis are available.
sentences.chinese: 但是关于空气污染与静脉血栓关系的数据却很有限。

sentences.english: Typically, intracardiac catheters are positioned in the right atrium and in the coronary sinus.
sentences.chinese: 通常上是把心脏内导管置于右心房和冠状静脉窦内。

sentences.english: Intraenous fluid repletion allows oral fluids to be offered sparingly.
sentences.chinese: 允许口服液体补充静脉体液量。

sentences.english: Does crossing legs cause spider veins?
sentences.chinese: 交叉双腿会导致静脉曲张？

sentences.english: The vessels of vascular pedicles were anastomosed to the femoral artery and the branches of saphenous vein.
sentences.chinese: 皮瓣血管蒂分刖与股动脉及大隐静脉吻合。

sentences.english: Objective To study the imaging features of Klippel-Trenaunay syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨静脉畸形骨肥大综合征影像诊断的征象。

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnosis and treatment of mesenteric vein thrombosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨肠系膜静脉血栓形成的诊断和治疗。

sentences.english: The resection of occipital condylar and jugular tuber can increase surgical freedom.
sentences.chinese: 枕髁和颈静脉结节的磨除可增加手术视野。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the role of aspisol in the children's febrile disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察静脉滴注来比林在儿童发热性疾病中的作用。

sentences.english: After surgery you will be given intravenous fluids (IV’s) in your arm.
sentences.chinese: 手术后，你将在手臂上被给予静脉输液。

sentences.english: Drug and non-intravenous drug users in these two lines of defense is extremely fragile.
sentences.chinese: 戒毒和不静脉注射毒品这两道防线是极其脆弱的。

sentences.english: Diabetic mouse models were established by intravenous injection of alloxan tetrahydrate.
sentences.chinese: 四氧嘧啶尾静脉注射制作糖尿病小鼠模型。

sentences.english: Clinical Study on the Pathogenic Characters of Extremity Superficial Thrombophlebitis;
sentences.chinese: 目的观察散瘀止痛汤治疗血栓性静脉炎的效果。

sentences.english: In the past, the flow of vein transfuse belonged to pure technology flow.
sentences.chinese: 过去的静脉输液流程是纯技术流程。

definition: hematoma/swelling of soft tissue due to internal hemorrhage
